snippet: A federal judge chastised Charles J. Hynes, the Brooklyn district attorney, for defending and promoting a prosecutor in his office whose illegal tactics sent an innocent man to prison for 15 years.
abstract: Federal Judge Frederic Block chastises Brooklyn District Attorney Charles J Hynes for defending and promoting a prosecutor in his office whose illegal tactics sent an innocent man to prison for 15 years; comments are made during pretrial proceedings over a lawsuit filed by Jabbar Collins, who was exonerated of murder charges in June 2010.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge chastised Charles J. Hynes, the Brooklyn district attorney, for defending and promoting a prosecutor in his office whose illegal tactics sent an innocent man to prison for 15 years.

headline.seo: Federal Judge Rebukes Brooklyn District Attorney, Charles Hynes
headline.main: Top Prosecutor in Brooklyn Is Rebuked by U.S. Judge
headline.print_headline: Top Prosecutor In Brooklyn Is Rebuked By U.S. Judge
